OOC: As i have said before, i dont get all of my e-mails.  But i never miss a 
post.  I read the message board to catch up with what i didnt get. So please 
dont worry about it if you get those 'mail delivery problem' messages.

:::Hun-Grr/Cyclonus/Scourge/Time Warp/The Destrocons/Falcon/Snare:::

Hun-grr: You miss see Megatron beat slag out of Motormaster! He the leader 
now.
::Cyclonus and Scourge nod at Megatron::
Cyclonus: That kind a of loyalty, and more.
Scourge: We will serve you in any way we can.
~~~~~
::Time Warp nods::
Time Warp: Okay.
::He leans next to the cave where they had been sleeping and relaxes::
~~~~~
::My Destrons look all around as the alarms go off.  Ramjet looks at 
Drillbit::
Ramjet: Why are there alarms going off?

--part1_7e.128d1556.27eb4b71_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
